website_summaries.verdict: This popular plus-sized pup makes the perfect bedtime pal for both boys and girls.
pros: Super soft with generous padding for extra comfort
Classic design is timeless and gender-neutral, inviting cuddles from boys and girls of all ages
With a bit of care, this puppy is conveniently machine washable
cons: Some feel that the fill may be a bit too lofty for smaller children

customer_reviews.title: For a College student
customer_reviews.text: My freshman college student was having a hard time sleeping in the new environment. At home he had a similar "pillow" and having one at school has helped him sleep, which for a college student is very important! It was a little too fuzzy for him on the top side, so he turned it upside down and now it is perfect. Thanks for an easy solution to the sleep issue!

Color:BrownProduct Description It's a pillow, it's a pet… it's a pillow pet. A super-soft Chenille plush folding stuffed animal so cuddly you'll never want to put it down! An ideal naptime companion – not to mention a comforting partner on road trips or airplane rides – Pillow Pets are anything but just another toddler pillow. From the Manufacturer 18" plush by My Pillow Pet. Extra cuddly Puppy Dog is made of soft beige plush. Open the velcro closure and use as a pillow. Close the velcro closure and you have the softest pet ever.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
18" plush by My Pillow Pet. Extra cuddly Puppy Dog is made of soft beige plush. Open the velcro closure and use as a pillow. Close the velcro closure and you have the softest pet ever.
feature_bullets: ANIMAL FANS: If you think that your favorite animal is adorable, then imagine how cute it’d be as a plush! Bring your favorite animal home as a Pillow Pet & go on an adventure or take a comfy nap.

COMFORTING COMPANION: Pillow Pets presents super soft, cute, & adorable stuffed animals that unfold into fuzzy pillows for sleep. Kids, teens, & adults love these classic & collectible comfy critters.
COMFORT: This plush is a pal by day, then unfasten its belly to make a pillow by night! Comfortable travel friend for any child on road trips & airplanes. Also use as boy & girl bedroom decoration.
BEST BUDDY: Children of all ages will love this original toy for play & as a large pillow for reading, watching television, studying, and sleepy nap time. Youth love to read with this cozy creature.
DETAILS: This original plush is made of high-quality washable chenille & is BPA-free & Phthalates-free. To wash, place in white pillow case and tie off open end. Machine wash cold, gentle cycle.
